instruction: Suggest three ways to reach potential customers in an online environment.
output: Three ways to reach potential customers in an online environment are through pay-per-click advertising, social media marketing, and search engine optimization (SEO). Pay-per-click (PPC) allows you to display adverts specific to a customer's search terms, making it an effective way to reach potential customers. Social media marketing involves creating and engaging with content to create relationships with customers and boost brand visibility. Finally, SEO helps to increase your website ranking in search engine results pages and brings high-quality traffic to your website.
